data.lyric:
[ti:Better Days]
[ar:NEIKED/Mae Muller/Polo G]
[al:Better Days]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Better Days - NEIKED/Mae Muller/Polo G
[00:00.14]Lyrics by：NEIKED/Polo G/Elin Bergman/Kian Sang/Karl Ivert
[00:00.28]Composed by：NEIKED/Polo G/Elin Bergman/Kian Sang/Karl Ivert
[00:00.42]Mae Muller：
[00:09.24]I've been feelin' lonely 
[00:11.07]I need someone to hold me 
[00:13.41]Come on baby hold me 
[00:15.33]
[00:17.67]Yeah I've been feelin' jaded 
[00:19.74]Don't know how I should play it 
[00:22.14]Tell me how to play it 
[00:24.03]
[00:26.13]Now you you've been movin' on 
[00:29.73]Let me know can I come along 
[00:33.99]Since you're gone oh its been so long 
[00:38.58]On my own my own my own my own 
[00:41.97]
[00:42.87]Mae Muller：
[00:43.02]Livin' in a haze stayin' in the shade 
[00:47.34]All I do is sit around and wait for better days 
[00:51.69]I could use a break can I get an Amen 
[00:56.07]All I do is sit around and wait for better days 
[01:00.15]Polo G：
[01:00.30]
[01:07.56]Uh uh 
[01:09.18]
[01:09.78]Can I get an Amen 
[01:11.34]Introverted can't make friends 
[01:13.44]Pray for better days now it's three hundred K when my day ends 
[01:18.12]Do you remember last night 
[01:19.32]'Cause I blacked out 
[01:20.40]In that all white dress with her back out 
[01:22.38]Said Be careful with her heart 'cause it's fragile 
[01:24.75]And thinkin' 'bout her past make her lash out 
[01:26.79]See with me it ain't no worries at all 
[01:29.13]Any problem I'll be there one call 
[01:31.56]If we locked in you my dawg 
[01:33.36]Fan of you I hang pictures on my wall 
[01:35.97]Roll one let's get high tonight 
[01:38.10]Backseat Maybach lavish life 
[01:40.08]Chillin' with the stars like a satellite 
[01:42.69]AP on my arm and it's shinin' bright uh 
[01:44.25]Mae Muller：
[01:44.40]Livin' in a haze 
[01:46.11]Haze 
[01:46.26]Stayin' in the shade 
[01:47.79]The shade 
[01:48.48]All I do is sit around and wait for better days 
[01:51.03]Sit around and wait 
[01:52.77]I could use a break can I get an Amen 
[01:56.58]Amen 
[01:57.12]All I do is sit around and wait for better days 
[02:00.72]Mae Muller：
[02:00.87]Sit around sit around sit around and wait 
[02:03.45]
[02:05.13]Better better better days oh 
[02:10.16]I could use a break oh 
[02:13.52]
[02:14.16]Better better better better 
[02:16.37]
[02:17.27]For better days oh oh oh oh oh oh 
[02:23.55]All I do is sit around and wait for better days 
[02:27.76]
[02:28.30]Better days 
[02:32.17]All I do is sit around and wait for better days 
[02:36.35]
[02:36.85]Oh oh
data.trans:
[ti:Better Days]
[ar:NEIKED/Mae Muller/Polo G]
[al:Better Days]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.14]//
[00:00.28]//
[00:00.42]//
[00:09.24]我一直在与孤独拉扯
[00:11.07]我需要有人来抱住我
[00:13.41]来吧 宝贝 抱住我
[00:15.33]
[00:17.67]是的 我总是疲惫不堪
[00:19.74]不知道该何去何从
[00:22.14]告诉我 我该如何应付
[00:24.03]
[00:26.13]现在你走向了美好的未来
[00:29.73]告诉我 我能否与你一路同行
[00:33.99]从你离开之后 已经过去了这么久
[00:38.58]我独自一人 独自一人 独自一人 独自一人
[00:41.97]
[00:42.87]//
[00:43.02]迷失在迷雾之中 藏身于阴影之下 
[00:47.34]我只能干坐着 默默等待美好生活找上我
[00:51.69]我可以休息片刻 我能否祈求得到上帝的保佑
[00:56.07]我只能干坐着 默默等待美好生活找上我
[01:00.15]//
[01:00.30]
[01:07.56]//
[01:09.18]
[01:09.78]我能否祈求得到上帝的保佑
[01:11.34]性格内向 交不了朋友
[01:13.44]我在祈祷幸福生活找上我 现在我日进斗金
[01:18.12]你还记得昨晚吗
[01:19.32]因为我为她神魂颠倒
[01:20.40]她穿着一袭白裙背对着我
[01:22.38]跟我说 好好对待她的心 因为那东西脆弱不堪 
[01:24.75]想到她的过去 她破口大骂
[01:26.79]看吧 和我在一起 什么也不用担心
[01:29.13]不管有什么问题 我随叫随到
[01:31.56]如果我们陷入了困境 还有你 我的兄弟
[01:33.36]我是你的粉丝 我还在墙上挂了你的照片
[01:35.97]点一支烟 今晚让我们狂欢一场
[01:38.10]汽车后座 迈巴赫 奢侈的生活
[01:40.08]看着星空放松 把自己当作其中之一
[01:42.69]手上戴着名表 闪闪发光
[01:44.25]//
[01:44.40]迷失在迷雾之中
[01:46.11]迷雾
[01:46.26]藏身于阴影之下
[01:47.79]阴影
[01:48.48]我只能干坐着 默默等待美好生活找上我
[01:51.03]干坐着 默默等待着
[01:52.77]我可以休息片刻 我能否祈求得到上帝的保佑
[01:56.58]阿门
[01:57.12]我只能干坐着 默默等待美好生活找上我
[02:00.72]//
[02:00.87]干坐着 干坐着 干坐着 默默等待着 
[02:03.45]
[02:05.13]美好 美好 美好生活
[02:10.16]我可以休息片刻
[02:13.52]
[02:14.16]美好 美好 美好 美好
[02:16.37]
[02:17.27]等待美好生活
[02:23.55]我只能干坐着 默默等待美好生活找上我
[02:27.76]
[02:28.30]美好生活
[02:32.17]我只能干坐着 默默等待美好生活找上我
[02:36.35]
[02:36.85]//
